WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Animals
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.description: Will prefer food for animals. Hunt > Grass > Human corpses > hay > kibble..\nBut will allow other foods if those are not available.
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Hunt / Grass / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / RawTasty / InsectCorpse / Corpse / MealFine / MealLavish

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: No hunt
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Grass / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / InsectCorpse / Corpse / RawTasty / MealFine / MealLavish

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Food4animals only
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.description: Only foods for animal: Grass, hay, kibble, raw human meat/corpse.\nBut also simple and nutrient paste meals (they are more cost efficient than kibble!).
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Hunt / Grass / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Allow trees
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.description: Same as "animals" but allows trees. Useful for thrumbos
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Hunt / Grass / Tree / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / RawTasty / InsectCorpse / Corpse / MealFine / MealLavish

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: No human corpse
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.description: Same as "Animals" default but will not eat humanlike corpses.
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Hunt / Grass / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / RawTasty / InsectCorpse / Corpse / MealFine / MealLavish
